Description: This collection contains datasets from ENSPRESO2, an EU-28 wide, open dataset on renewable energy potentials, at national (NUTS0), regional and high-resolution (1 x 1 km and 5 x 5 km) levels for the 2010-2050 period. Within ENSPRESO, ENergy Systems Potential Renewable Energy SOurces, and the ENSPRESO2 updates, technical potentials are provided for wind, solar and biomass, based on coherent GIS-based land-restriction scenarios. [...] For biomass, agriculture, forestry and waste sectors are considered. The temporal resolution for wind and solar is both annual.

Long name: Open Street Map electricity transmission grid
Description: Transmission grid topology and infrastructure on substations, lines and cables from Open Street Map (OSM). The dataset is built from OSM data and is not versioned. The latest dataset can be built using the scripts in the repository.
Percentage of Urban population by country, United Nations Population Division. World Urbanization Prospects: 2018 Revision.

In this repository are over 5000 georeferenced industrial sites of energy-intensive industry sectors published, together with GHG-emissions, production capacity, fuel demand and excess heat potentials calculated from emission and production data.
An assessment of the CO2 storage potential in Europe, including storage units, traps, and maps.
Statistics and information on the worldwide supply of, demand for, and flow of the mineral commodity nitrogen.

Long name: Nomenclature of Territorial Units for Statistics (NUTS) 2013 - shapefiles
Description: Shapefiles of EU's Nomenclature of Territorial Units for Statistics (NUTS) 2013, which is a hierarchical system for dividing up the economic territory of the European Union.

Long name: Nomenclature of Territorial Units for Statistics (NUTS) 2021 - shapefiles
Description: Shapefiles of EU's Nomenclature of Territorial Units for Statistics (NUTS) 2021, which is a hierarchical system for dividing up the economic territory of the European Union.
European energy balances by country and fuel, as reported by Eurostat.
License: Reuse policy following 2011/833/EU ; newer versions of the same data are available as CC-BY-4.0 through the eurostat API

Description: Disaggregated final energy consumption in household - quantities (nrg_d_hhq)
The LUISA Base Map 2018 is a high-resolution land use/land cover map developed and produced by the Joint Research Centre of the European Commission

The JRC-IDEES-2021 release contains a consistent set of disaggregated energy-economy-emissions data for each Member State of the European Union, covering all sectors of the energy system for the 2000-2021 period: industry, buildings, transport, and power generation.
Scientific Grid Model of European Gas Transmission Networks,Gas transmission data model
Owner: DLR Institute for Networked Energy Systems

Description: Interannual Electricity Demand Calculator,generates country-level electricity consumption time series based on weather data and correlates historical electricity demand to temperature

Long name: Open Power System Data - Electricity Demand
Description: Time series data of electricity consumption at country-level for various European countries.
Time series data of electricity consumption at country-level for various European countries.
Time series data of electricity consumption for Great Britain.
"Land cover and land use inventory of European continent"
To build ship density raster and use it further to compute availability matrix for renewables
To estimate potentials for offshore wind in country's EEZ
Average annual population to calculate regional GDP data (thousand persons) by NUTS 3 region (nama_10r_3popgdp)

Description: Gross Domestic Product per capita (PPP)
Spatial distribution of population

Long name: Total GHG emissions and removals in the EU
Description: National emissions reported to the UNFCCC and to the EU under the Governance Regulation

Long name: General Bathymetric Chart of the Oceans
Description: Gridded Bathymetric data for ocean and land, providing elevation data in meters, on a 15 arc-second interval grid.
International ports with attributes describing name, port functions, total capacity and location
Pan European Land cover for 44 thematic classes with 2012 as reference year
Motor and passenger vehicles count

Description: Salt cavern potentials in GWh/sqkm

Description: OSM-Boundaries was created to enable users to easily extract boundaries such as country borders, state borders, and equivalents from the OpenStreetMap databases
Methane and hydrogen infrastructure in Europe, including pipelines, LNG terminals, gas power plants and extraction sites.
Steel plant global locations and characteristics, including production capacity, ownership, and emissions data.
Cement and concrete plant global locations and characteristics, including production capacity, ownership, and emissions data.

Long name: Ten Year Network Development Plan (TYNDP) electricity transmission grid
Description: Transmission grid topology based on the ENTSO-E/ENTSO-G TYNDP scenarios, including planned and existing lines.
Global dataset of power plants with their location, capacity and technology type.
Technology cost and performance assumptions for Europe for various technologies, including renewables, fossil fuels.
Country-level runoff data, daily sums, for Europe, used for rescaling hydro-electricity availability in weather years not covered by EIA hydro-generation statistics.

Description: Country-level heating degree days for Europe, used for rescaling heat demand in weather years not covered by energy statistics.
Link to website: see `rule retrieve_country_runoff` in the PyPSA-Eur repository

Description: Protected areas in Europe as defined by the Natura 2000 network.

Population data for Switzerland.

Vehicle activity profiles for different vehicle types and road types in Germany, based on monitoring data from the Federal Highway Research Institute (BASt). These profiles provide insights into travel behavior and patterns, which can be used for transport modeling and analysis.
Shapes of district heating areas

Long name: Annual Regional Database of the European Commission's Directorate General for Regional and Urban Policy
Description: The database contains a set of long time-series variables and indicators for EU regions, as well as for regions in some EFTA and candidate countries, at various statistical scales (NUTS1, NUTS2, NUTS3, metro regions).
